templaterest-desc: Restful service for editing template transclusions.
apihelp-templaterest-description: Restful service for editing template transclusions.
templaterest-put-templates: Templaterest PUT transclusions.  The following template transclusions where updated or added: $1.
templaterest-delete-templates: Templaterest DELETE transclusions.  The following template transclusions where deleted: $1.
templaterest-patch-templates: Templaterest PATCH transclusions.  The following template transclusions where updated or added: $1.
